name: Kejetia Market
address: Dr. Mensah Road, Adum, Kumasi, Ghana
description: One of the largest markets in West Africa, Kejetia is the beating heart of trade in Kumasi with thousands of stalls offering everything from food to electronics.

name: KNUST - Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
description: Ghana's leading science and technology institution, KNUST is a symbol of academic excellence and innovation, drawing students and researchers from across Africa.

name: Kumasi Central Mosque
description: A significant religious and cultural landmark in Adum, drawing hundreds of worshippers and visitors to its beautiful structure and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Kumasi Railway Terminal
description: A historic and modernized railway hub connecting Kumasi to major regions across Ghana — vital for transport and trade.

name: Rattray Park
address: Off Victoria Opoku Ware Road, Kumasi, Ghana
description: A modern recreational park featuring fountains, playgrounds, and green spaces — perfect for family outings and events.

name: Lancaster Kumasi City Hotel
address: Rain Tree Street, Adum, Kumasi, Ghana
description: One of Kumasi's finest hotels offering luxurious accommodation, conference spaces, and exceptional hospitality near the city center.

name: Komfo Anokye Teaching Hospital
address: Komfo Anokye Road, Bantama, Kumasi, Ghana
description: A premier teaching hospital in West Africa, Komfo Anokye is known for its medical excellence and historical significance to the Ashanti Kingdom.

name: Kumasi City Mall
description: A modern shopping destination featuring international brands, restaurants, a cinema, and vibrant retail experiences in the heart of Kumasi.
